column4: hey. I just added my first virtual host to apache2, and am trying to figure out why apache2 doesn't start anymore. error_log says "unable to open logs".  the virual host is in /home/myuser/public_html/   for testing, I've chmod 777'd that whole folder, to no avail.  Anybody got an idea what I'm missing?
check your apache config, and look where the logfiles are supposed to go
there is a general logfile, and you can configure logfiles per Vhost
all of the directories should be writable to the user running the process (normaly www-data), you are not running apache as 'you' are you?
